subject: Re: [junit] Domain specific question
msgSnippet: ... Give me five! Yet another impossible TDD task solved repeatedly and effectively. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
David Vydra wrote:

> I have written three interpreters using TDD approach and I would not do it
> any other way. There is usually so much complexity that without supporting
> tests you keep chasing your own tail.

Give me five! Yet another impossible TDD task solved repeatedly and
effectively.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
